div.p: Thamoys to Kleon, greetings. I have contracted the work in thanismos, and having received the symbolon from you, we have written the contract and have given the symbolon to Pasis. [...] to hinder [...]. Know that the dyke is being flooded. We have written you so that you do not hold us responsible. [Farewell. Date]. Translation: B. Van Beek in P.Petr.Kleon, p. 78, Â© Peeters
